---
title: "IMDB Data Cleaning"
format: html
---

```{r}
# import relevant packages
library(tidyverse)

# import data
imdb_messy <- read_csv("..\\data\\imdb_movie_dataset.csv")

#look at data
head(imdb_messy)
str(imdb_messy)
```

```{r}
# clean the data
imdb_cleaned <- imdb_messy |>
  select(Title,Rating) |> # select only title and rating
  drop_na(Title, Rating)
```
